lines: Gundu may become impatient with scarce food on island, but Ranu Vali cannot rush sowing of seeds. Like raising strong nestlings, good crops come to Vanu who tend them carefully.
Ranu Vali remembers when she was nestling, she wants to live in sea of flowers. But most beautiful flowers bloom where sun shines brightest.
Ranu comes to Ok' Gundu Nakki where sun shines bright, but she sees nothing but rocks and dirt. So Ranu knows she must help the sun, and sow the sea of flowers on her own.
Zundu are kind to give land to Gundu for tilling, but like flowers without sun, Zundu will wilt under shadow of Vundu.
Ranu thinks that if all Vanu fall under the same shadow of Vundu, then no Vanu can flourish like blooming field. This is what Vundu want.
Gundu and Zundu can work together to reap the earth now. Soon, every Vanu will be adorned with precious flowers and enjoy the gift of fruit from Gundu soil!

obj.n: 受け継ぐは伝統のみならず
風は渦巻く閃光の如し
